title: This ain't your Dad's Hot Wheels - Hot Wheels: Rift Rally
description: Thanks to Hot Wheels Rift Rally for sponsoring todays video! Get your Hot Wheels Rift Rally at GameStop or by using the link below:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:49 Meet The Chameleon  2:24 What else is in the box 3:03 Setting up 4:45 Going for a spin 6:35 Building the track 8:04 Race time! 9:33 Outro
